Text:
It is working okay on my box Win7x64.
Works on Career mode just fine do not activate and do no not create a EA account.

Works fine on my PC Windows 7 x64
Make sure to skip activation on install & DO NOT create a EA account when starting a new game.
Only works on Career mode and not multiplayer.
If you want to play multiplayer & like the single player support the developers and buy.

Also be sure to launch from the NFS11.exe not the launcher.exe.

The NFS11.EXE works, skip the online activation is a bit weird, but after skipping the instalation in the ad key screen, the install compleet anyway....
After install Replace the NFS11.EXE, and run this, and you have the game ;)

Dont use other stuff!!!, the other stuff like the online tool is fake and give you a virus only.
